title: Dia 3 Mid LFT

embed.description: Summoner Lookup with statistics, ratings, LoLSkillScore and more for cc Rhino, a League of Legends summoner on the Europe West region.

body:
Mid main since S3.

Looking for an ambitious Ranked Team (Dia++) with high Standards and Goals.

I´m from Germany but I speak English fluently so that wont be a problem.

I have a big Championpool and adapt good to the meta.

Im 18 years old and still going to school so i have a lot of freetime to practice.

Playing Cups and maybe having a coach would be nice too.

I have ts3 and Skype, just add me ingame for further Questions.


Looking forward to your answers 

Rhino
